awd_titl_txt: Research in Graph Algorithms and Combinatorial Optimization
awd_abstract_narration: This project focuses on design of efficient algorithms for                      combinatorial optimization problems.  Many efficient parallel                   algorithms were obtained as a result of a deeper understanding of               combinatorial structure of the problems, and therefore the emphasis of          this research is to combine the work on improving the                           parallel/distributed complexity of the algorithms with the work on              improving their sequential complexity.  In particular, the research             concentrates on finding efficient parallel deterministic algorithms             for the class of problems related to bipartite matching and on finding          efficient sequential  algorithms for problems related to generalized            flow and multicommodity flow.  Another important part of this research          is to develop techniques that allow transformation of efficient                 parallel algorithms into algorithms that are efficient in the context           of distributed computation.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Computing and Communication Foundations
